reviews.review: A classic. More than that, a part of internet culture.

3D游戏解谜的巅峰之作，把空间转移和机关的搭配做到了极致。

Literally the best game ever made. It's fun and challenging, the Co-op mode is amazing, and the humor is the best to be found in any game. Also the support for community mods is fantastic. There are some great mods out there, I especially recommend Portal Reloaded, it is good enough to be considered portal 3.

it was amazing. i havent tried the co-op but will do that asap. it was so funny, and also so stressful. worth the money i paid for this. trully a masterpiece. and i usually dont play these kinds of games.

British man chases you. The game.
Прошел за один день и на следующий день мог делать порталы у себя дома.
Игра очень интересная,интригующий сюжет и разнообразные головоломки.

This is a direct upgrade to Portal 1, and I would say with no fear that this game is one of the best ever made. The storyline is absolutely well crafted and just like I stated in my review for Portal 1 the characters are insanely funny. It is interesting to see yourself going through the middle of the facility while you have 2 pieces of A.I bossing you around. This game is perfect, I just wish the multiplayer mode still worked with online players (nobody seems to be playing it). Valve absolutely nailed this game, the Portal series is the best.

In Czech

Nejlepší logická a příběhová hra, kterou jsem hrál. Portal 2 se dá hrát i na čas. Portal 2 nemá žádné programové chyby (Nic jsem zatím nenašel.). Pokud někdo má pomalý počítač, tak Váš počítač jistě utáhne Portal 2. Já tuhle hru jistě doporučuji!
---------------
In English

The best logic and story game I've ever played. Portal 2 can also be played on time. Portal 2 has no program errors (I haven't found anything yet.). If someone has a slow computer, then your computer will definitely tighten Portal 2. I definitely recommend this game!
Still my favorite game to the day.

Это одна из лучших игр VALVE и ЛУЧШАЯ головоломка в мире. Геймплей завораживает своей умеренной динамикой и грасивыми, а главное подходящим эффектами. Сюжет очень хорош, а вся концовка до титров пробивает слезу. Очень приятная игра. Кооп режим добавляет вторую жизнь игре. А и ещё. Как я мог забыть о чёрном юморе, что смешной, но все ещё чёрный. 9.5 из 10. Отличная игра, но чертовски короткая
VALVE мы хотим PORTAL 3, но история уже закончена и мне кажется, что нужно оставить всё как есть.
The perfect game for comedy while mixing tragedy into a game. I have never played such an amazing game.
!!!ONE OF MY FAVORITE GAMES OF ALL TIME!!!! I RECOMMEND!! :D!!!
the portal 2 co op changes a man

It's still the best game in my Steam Library.

Also, if you enjoy the puzzle aspect of it and want some hard/fun/interesting challenges, I highly recommend trying out many mods.

This game is the perfect mix of funny and serious. No comedy or plot twist seems out of place. I have played this game like 5 times total (including on console). 10/10 Will probably play again when I get my steam deck. (and I honestly might buy it on switch and play it in full there as well)

One of the best games iv'e played! The creativity to pull this off with various puzzles to complete is amazing. Hats off to valve in creating such a great sequel.
